required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Redosing With CP-870, 893 in Patients With Clinical Benefit After a Single Infusion From A Phase I, Open-Label, Dose-Escalation Study of CP-870,893 in Patients With Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Redosing With CP-870,893 in Patients With Clinical Benefit After a Single Infusion of CP-870,893 From A Phase I, Open-Label, Dose-Escalation Study of CP-870,893 in Patients With Solid Tumors

lead_sponsor.agency: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania

clinical_study.source: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania

brief_summary.textblock: Patients who had clinical benefit following a single infusion of CP-870, 893 on Protocol UPCC 10903 will receive a single repeated infusion of CP-870,893 at the same dose given on UPCC 10903 intravenously.

overall_official.affiliation: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania

facility.name: Abramson Cancer Center of the University of Pennsylvania

clinical_study.keyword: Subjects with Clinical Benefit After a Single Infusion of CP - 870, 893
